title: Wale + Ceo Rich Dennis Interview and More
itunes:title: Wale + Ceo Rich Dennis Interview and More
description:
Friday 4/28- Today on the show Wale stopped by to promote his album " Shine" which comes out today. Also, we had the CEO of Shea Moisture, Rich Dennis stop by and try to clear the air about their recent controversial ad that came out. Charlamagne also gave Donkey of the Day to our Celebrity and Chief Donald Trump because of the comments he made about being President.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 4/28- Today on the show Wale stopped by to promote his album " Shine" which comes out today. Also, we had the CEO of Shea Moisture, Rich Dennis stop by and try to clear the air about their recent controversial ad that came out. Charlamagne also gave Donkey of the Day to our Celebrity and Chief Donald Trump because of the comments he made about being President.
